title: Zipper Bag Fruit Salad
directions: Special equipment: a resealable plastic zipper bag
Mix the apple jelly and 2 tablespoons water in a resealable plastic zipper bag until combined. Pour in the fruit, seal and toss with your hands. Add the mint leaves and serve.
ingredients: 1 cup mixed fruit, such as pineapple chunks, melon chunks, grapes, blueberries
